title: Futuristic 'Bone Clocks' Encompasses A Strange, Rich World Of Soul-Stealers
teaser: David Mitchell's latest fantasy is an odyssey into the dark side, spanning from 1984 to 2043. It's about a teenager who runs away from her London home and becomes prey to a ghastly gang of mystics.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
